EmailTemplate.name: TSS_UserConference_August_Imc
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON: Don't miss out on Imc Training!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't miss out - There's still time to join us. September 13 - 16 l Boston, Massachusetts
There's still time to register for TriCON: TriTech's Annual User Conference being held September 14-16, 2011 in Boston, MA. We're heading to Boston just for you - our valued Imc clients.
Watch our video for a sneak peek at what TriCON has to offer. Link to video: http://offers.tritech.com/2011_UserConference_Imc.html
With the Detailed Agenda and our ROI Letter, we've made it easier to receive approval to this important educational event.
Link to register: https://www.signup4.net/Public/ap.aspx?EID=TRIC17E
Cost: $795 - Registration fee (includes breakfast, lunch, and evening events) $300 - Day Pass
Location: Boston Park Plaza Hotel and Towers in Boston, MA.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
